page.title: 02LIFE IN A VILLAGE
page.content: Living in a village can be difficult for transport, as often the buses do not travel there. Also there are not many large department stores, so you have to do your weekly shopping in town. Living in a village is much more peaceful than living in a town. Also there is much more wildlife. Living in a town is much more convenient for gas, petrol, etc.Also it may be hard to find transport in a village to your work unless you have a car, because often there aren't many jobs apart from farming, and if your ambition is not to be a farmer but to be a business person, youv'e got a problem.
